thread.section_title: Big Tall Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Big Tall Direct | www.bigtalldirect.com
thread.title: daniel young
thread.title_full: Big Tall Direct reviewed by daniel young

author: daniel young
title: daniel young
text: this is an outfit that buys a lot of seconds, then sells them as as top quality. their return policy sucks because you have to pay return shipping. the sizes don't match from one supplier to another. ALSO, YOU CAN FORGET A RESONCE TO ANY QUESTION YOU MAY HAVE ABOUT FUTURE PRODUCT AVAILABILLTY. THEY CAN'T BE BOTHERED. BUT THEY GET OFFENDED IF YOU DON'T GIVE THEM A FIVE STAR RATING.
